New Records: Pete Alonso became the first major leaguer to hit a go-ahead, three-run homer when his team was trailing in the ninth inning or later of a winner-take-all postseason game
Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a go-ahead, three-run homer in the ninth inning; Milwaukee Brewers appeared to win with back-to-back homers in the seventh inning; New York Mets won their NL Wild Card Series for the first time since 2015
Pre-Game Insights: New York Mets had a strong finish in the regular season after struggling earlier; the team's resilience was a key factor in their playoff run
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee Brewers manager expressed disappointment over the loss; New York Mets players reflected on their journey and resilience
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first postseason meeting between the Mets and Phillies; the series win marked a significant milestone for the Mets
